roleset.name: to void or annul
roleset.note: REVOKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'revoke' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from revoke.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Drexel says [0] it does n't expect [0][any of its state brokerage licenses]-1 will be revoked [*-1] , and even if some are [*?*] , its securities business would n't be directly hurt [*-2] .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Connecticut-1 already has issued a `` notice of intent '' [*]-1 to revoke Drexel 's brokerage license .
